ClassDesc: A sub-directory of a single raw contact that contains all of its @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#Data_E@ rows. To access this directory append @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#RawContacts#Entity#CONTENT_DIRECTORY_E@ to the raw contact URI. See @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#RawContactsEntity_E@ for a stand-alone table containing the same data. Entity has two ID fields: @B_android#provider#BaseColumns#_ID_E@ for the raw contact and @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#RawContacts#Entity#DATA_ID_E@ for the data rows. Entity always contains at least one row, even if there are no actual data rows. In this case the @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#RawContacts#Entity#DATA_ID_E@ field will be null. Using Entity should be preferred to using two separate queries: RawContacts followed by Data. The reason is that Entity reads all data for a raw contact in one transaction, so there is no possibility of the data changing between the two queries.
